snippet.title: Megaloot - Official Alpha Gameplay Trailer | The MIX x Kinda Funny Spring Showcase 2024
snippet.description: Here's your look at alpha gameplay from Megaloot, an upcoming inventory management roguelite RPG, where meticulous loot management paves the way for creating diverse and powerful builds. In Megaloot, combine loot strategically to craft dominating setups, and unlock new deck cards to become an ultimate power hunter. Megaloot is coming to PC.
